Text: Leaving UK is a relationship drama written by acclaimed screenwriter Tony Marchant. It’s a character-driven story about the complexities of love, family and growing up. 25 year old Aaron Hughes lives with his parents in Warrington. He’s failed to get a job since leaving university and his ex-girlfriend Phoebe is about to marry his brother. Life’s not panning out the way he’d hoped. After he meets Julie Ranmore, a married mum of two, he finds his life changing.
